summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of North Eighty-third Street from Greenwood Avenue to Woodland Park Avenue in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewer walks under Ordinance No. 20120, creating Local Improvement District No. 1945 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
